data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Throw-in Toluca.
In the minute 1, San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Toluca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 3, San Luis have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In Toluca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for San Luis at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 6, Diego Montano Robles signals a San Luis throw-in in Toluca's half.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 7, Michael Estrada puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Michael Estrada is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 11, Toluca's Michael Estrada is back in action after a slight knock.
Goal! German Berterame equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Great play from Nicolas Ibanez to set up the goal.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Toluca.
Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Toluca.
In the minute 16, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to San Luis.
Toluca to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
Javier Guemez (Toluca) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 18, Free kick for San Luis in the half of Toluca.
San Luis are pushing forward but Mauro Quiroga's finish is wide of the goal.
Diego Montano Robles awards Toluca a goal kick.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In Toluca Toluca attack through Anibal Chala. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the away team in Toluca.
Free kick for San Luis in the half of Toluca.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
In the minute 23, San Luis's Nicolas Ibanez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Toluca have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Free kick San Luis.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Alan Medina (Toluca) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 26, Can Toluca capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
San Luis's Matias Catalan misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
In the minute 28, Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Alexis Canelo.
Michael Estrada with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
In the minute 32, Toluca's Jonatan Maidana gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Nemesio Diez. But the effort is unsuccessful.
San Luis have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 35, San Luis have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in San Luis.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to San Luis.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of San Luis.
Jorge Sanchez for San Luis has been booked by Diego Montano Robles and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 43, Rubens Sambueza of Toluca gets in a strike, but is off target.
Diego Montano Robles awards San Luis a goal kick.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 44, Diego Montano Robles waits before resuming play because Alan Medina for Toluca is still down.
San Luis are coming forward and Nicolas Ibanez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
In the minute 45, Alan Medina for Toluca is back on the field again.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Toluca close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Diego Montano Robles blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
In the minute 46, Juan Castro is replacing Jorge Sanchez for the away team.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
In the minute 48, In Toluca a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gaston Sauro (Toluca) gets a yellow card.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Goal! Alexis Canelo extends Toluca's lead to 3-1.
In the minute 49, That's a fine assist from Anibal Chala.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Toluca.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 54, San Luis have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
Luis Leon gets his shot on target but fails to score for San Luis.
In the minute 57, San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
An attacking San Luis player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! San Luis now trail just 3-2 thanks to a penalty from Nicolas Ibanez.
In the minute 60, Diego Montano Robles awards San Luis a goal kick.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
In the minute 63, Toluca have a goal kick.
Diego Montano Robles awards Toluca a goal kick.
Enrique Triverio is on a sub for Michael Estrada for Toluca.
In the minute 65, Toluca make their second substitution with Antonio Rios replacing Alan Medina.
Toluca's Rubens Sambueza breaks free at Estadio Nemesio Diez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Toluca.
In the minute 69, The away team replace Pablo Barrera with Anderson Julio.
Enrique Triverio for Toluca drives towards goal at Estadio Nemesio Diez. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 70, Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
The away team replace Uziel Martinez with Pablo Lopez.
San Luis to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Toluca drives forward and Rubens Sambueza gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 73, Diego Pineda is replacing Matias Catalan for San Luis at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 75, Nicolas Ibanez is booked for the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
Toluca have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a San Luis throw-in in Toluca's half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a throw-in for San Luis, close to Toluca's area.
In the minute 80, In Toluca San Luis drive forward through Anderson Julio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, Toluca to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
Free kick for San Luis in the half of Toluca.
In the minute 83, Jonatan Maidana (Toluca) has received a first yellow card.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
In the minute 84, Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
In the minute 86, Giovanny Leon is on a sub for Rubens Sambueza for Toluca.
Diego Montano Robles signals a Toluca throw-in in San Luis's half.
Throw-in for San Luis at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 88, Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of San Luis.
Toluca are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 89, At Estadio Nemesio Diez, Camilo Mayada has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of San Luis.
At Estadio Nemesio Diez the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Throw-in high up the field for Toluca in Toluca.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-2.
San Luis's German Berterame has been booked in Toluca.
